name: Vegetarian
description: The vegetarian diet is a diet that excludes animal proteins from food for ethical, environmental or health reasons.

name: Togolese
description: It is a particularly rich cuisine, very diverse and renowned throughout Africa

name: Beninese
description: Beninese cuisine is mainly based on corn paste in the south of the country and yam in the north.

name: Breakfast
description: The first meal of the day especially when taken in the morning

name: Moroccan
description: Moroccan cuisine is typically a mix of Berber, Arab, Andalusi, and Mediterranean cuisines, with slight European and sub-Saharan influences

name: Cuisine
description: Classic recipes from around the world
